title: tusandii
author: tusandii
content: Hi everyone been a long time! Today I'd like to start a discussion about Solcasino, a brand new gambling platform that I feel unique with their advance multi-chain network integration. They support the most used blockchain as Solana USDC/USDT, BNB, APT, MATIC, BTC, ETH, CANTO and moreA brief summary about SolcasinoA Licensed Live Casino, Sportsbook, Crash, Poker.Solcasino.io is an online gambling platform that offers players a wide variety of games to choose from. The casino is operated by SolGame Ltd and is licensed by the government of Curacao. The website is available in multiple languages, making it accessible to players from different parts of the world. Players can enjoy a range of games including slots, table games, and live casino games from some of the top software providers in the industry. The website is user-friendly and easy to navigate, making it easy for players to find their favorite games. It's really new and It has more than 100k of daily active Users. Moreover, they also tweeted about their upcoming new features that include NFTs Staking within their platform that I haven't seen in another platform yet, such a WoW for me personally. What do you think about this new gambling platform and please share your honest experience if you have played with it?! ðŸ˜€

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: Looks a lot like Betfury, it just needs a wallet to connect which is the difference. Obviously, by its domain alone people would think this is just for Solana users but then we can see different tokens are accepted in this casino. It doesn't even need to have an "SOL" in its domain. Welcome to bitcointalk though.Â  Do you also have giveaways?

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: When I checked your site, there's no option to create a new account. Since you're accept Bitcoin, I think you're referring a fake Bitcoin run in Solana network isn't? that's not a real Bitcoin where the network is 100% decentralized and no one can control it.If you're accept a real Bitcoin, then this thread should be in Gambling board, but since it's a fake Bitcoin, it should be moved to altcoins board.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: Jawhead999 on February 27, 2023, 03:02:41 PMWhen I checked your site, there's no option to create a new account. Since you're accept Bitcoin, I think you're referring a fake Bitcoin run in Solana network isn't? that's not a real Bitcoin where the network is 100% decentralized and no one can control it.If you're accept a real Bitcoin, then this thread should be in Gambling board, but since it's a fake Bitcoin, it should be moved to altcoins board.For some unknown reason, I can't load the site. But from their web title, it says Web3, so yeah, I think you have to connect your wallet to play in this casino. And it makes sense why they can't allow real bitcoin if I'm correct in my assumption. However, this is not an announcement thread of course, it's a fan-made discussion thread as we have here on sportsbet, etc. I don't think it's necessary to move the thread anywhere. Gambling discussion is the perfect fit for this type of thread.

comments.author: madnessteat
comments.body: I really like Solana network even despite the problems that occur from time to time, because the commissions in this network are very low compared to competitors. Hopefully with time more and more casinos will start to accept Solana. I know Solcasino for about a year and can only share a positive experience playing at this casino.

comments.author: YOSHIE
comments.body: Quote from: tusandii on February 27, 2023, 02:36:57 PMWhat do you think about this new gambling platform and please share your honest experience if you have played with it?!Since you said, the solcasino.io gambling site is certain that we have never tried to bet there, is it fair, responsible or not, the point is if you want to know something new, especially online gambling, of course we need to test it first.From one side I try to review their reviews outside the forum, at first glance I see that Solcasino.io has a license number and registration number namely 8048/JAZ and 158185, there are also quite a lot of types of games available such as sports betting, such as the UEFA Europa League, Copa Libertadores and others as well as several other games such as Rummy, Jakcpot, Bingo, Bonus Buys and so on.Unfortunately, Solcasino.io has restricted countries such as France, the Netherlands, Spain, the United States, and several other countries that should have a high popularity of online gamblers, from the reviews i saw they don't have Live Chat this is also a problem for users who bet there.As said in the Solcasino.io review.Solcasino.io ReviewQuoteConsNo VIP ProgramNo Live Chat Support

comments.author: len01
comments.body: I have never seen this casino before but have heard from my friends out there who once bet on Solcasino.but in my opinion, even though I haven't tried betting at this casino, I'm a little interested in trying to test a small amount of betting at Solcasino. because the first time I entered on the site I was immediately attracted by the simple but very good appearance.even though previously I very rarely or almost never bet using altcoins like Solana and used bitcoin more often.but with this site, my heart felt interested in immediately testing some of the slot games on the site.

comments.author: electronicash
comments.body: i thought of our local Solaire Resort & Casino in my country after seeing the thread. yet i was wrong.have not seen any other else have NFT staking. is it profitable to stake NFTs in the platform? i couldn't find the link in the casino about it. if it requires me to connect my wallet to see it, i think you might wanna make it visible to anyone.

comments.author: TimeTeller
comments.body: Quote from: len01 on February 27, 2023, 04:59:43 PMI have never seen this casino before but have heard from my friends out there who once bet on Solcasino.but in my opinion, even though I haven't tried betting at this casino, I'm a little interested in trying to test a small amount of betting at Solcasino. because the first time I entered on the site I was immediately attracted by the simple but very good appearance.even though previously I very rarely or almost never bet using altcoins like Solana and used bitcoin more often.but with this site, my heart felt interested in immediately testing some of the slot games on the site.As we can see, this casino put a lot of effort to make this site as professional as they want to be. Also, they are offering pvp poker game, so this is good for poker players out there. They also have wide range of accepted tokens, however, based from their list of accepted tokens, wonder if it is still updated as the tokens's list is as of 1/31/22. Maybe the team can revisit this link and check if it is still the same or there are additional tokens on the list. https://docs.solcasino.io/info/supported-tokens

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: bittraffic on February 27, 2023, 02:59:55 PMLooks a lot like Betfury, it just needs a wallet to connect which is the difference. Obviously, by its domain alone people would think this is just for Solana users but then we can see different tokens are accepted in this casino. It doesn't even need to have an "SOL" in its domain. Welcome to bitcointalk though.Â  Do you also have giveaways?It's true what you said, in Solcasino it requires a wallet that is connected directly and there we can play without having to use or own Solana.In my opinion, Solcasino is a new casino project that is quite good and interesting for gamblers to try.Regarding the prizes I don't have them because I made this thread not to promote it but just to be able to discuss Solcasino and be able to get some experiences from other gamblers who have played there.Quote from: Jawhead999 on February 27, 2023, 03:02:41 PMIf you're accept a real Bitcoin, then this thread should be in Gambling board, but since it's a fake Bitcoin, it should be moved to altcoins board.It's true that it doesn't accept real Bitcoins but there are other crypto options that can be used besides Bitcoin so neither you nor us have to worry about accepting crypto tokens as their currency.How can I move this thread into the Altcoin discussion because this thread was made to discuss a gambling platform that is still relatively new, namely Solcasino.So it's only natural that I make this discussion thread in the gambling discussion section.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: It would be better if the casino had a registration form like other casinos so that we don't have to connect our personal wallets to the casino. That might provide comfort for users not used to playing gambling by connecting their personal wallets. Apart from that, they don't need to install other wallets just to play gambling.It is only a suggestion and depends on the discretion of the casino itself. If they keep using that method, that's fine too.But I found a little error when visiting the site and don't know what caused the error.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: Quote from: ethereumhunter on March 12, 2023, 09:56:16 AMIt would be better if the casino had a registration form like other casinos so that we don't have to connect our personal wallets to the casino. That might provide comfort for users not used to playing gambling by connecting their personal wallets. Apart from that, they don't need to install other wallets just to play gambling.It is only a suggestion and depends on the discretion of the casino itself. If they keep using that method, that's fine too.Yes, I agree with this, sometimes people are afraid to connect their wallet to any site because they are worried about losing money, there are many cases of losing money when connecting wallets, but for me it's not a problem but there's no harm in providing an alternative for other users such as a form to register like other casinos as well so that people can play without having to connect a wallet.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: ethereumhunter on March 12, 2023, 09:56:16 AMIt would be better if the casino had a registration form like other casinos so that we don't have to connect our personal wallets to the casino. That might provide comfort for users not used to playing gambling by connecting their personal wallets. Apart from that, they don't need to install other wallets just to play gambling.It is only a suggestion and depends on the discretion of the casino itself. If they keep using that method, that's fine too.For the safety and convenience of each user regarding connecting a personal wallet to the casino, we can actually still overcome it by creating a special personal wallet just to play at the casino. We can also save a few assets just to be able to play there, so you don't have to worry about things that are do not want to happen to our personal wallet.That way all the assets that we own and store will never be known by anyone because the wallet that we use to store is different from the wallet that is connected to the casino.Solcasino definitely has views and goals that they have calculated beforehand so even though their policy is a little risky and is not of interest to some gamblers, they know better and understand more about the policy.I appreciate the advice you've provided and all that for the comfort and safety of every gambler out there.

comments.author: klidex
comments.body: Quote from: piebeyb on March 12, 2023, 10:05:40 AMQuote from: ethereumhunter on March 12, 2023, 09:56:16 AMIt would be better if the casino had a registration form like other casinos so that we don't have to connect our personal wallets to the casino. That might provide comfort for users not used to playing gambling by connecting their personal wallets. Apart from that, they don't need to install other wallets just to play gambling.It is only a suggestion and depends on the discretion of the casino itself. If they keep using that method, that's fine too.Yes, I agree with this, sometimes people are afraid to connect their wallet to any site because they are worried about losing money, there are many cases of losing money when connecting wallets, but for me it's not a problem but there's no harm in providing an alternative for other users such as a form to register like other casinos as well so that people can play without having to connect a wallet.What we should know is that solcasino uses a web3 system like owl.game casino which allows users not to create an account or register to gamble.Usually this type of casino they do not require KYC and are more anonymous.But for security we will not know whether solcasino is safe to use.Because solcasino does not have a live chat that allows users to ask directly about anything to the support team.For more details, always be careful with casinos that we don't know before and do rigorous research before making a deposit and betting.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: tusandii on February 27, 2023, 02:36:57 PM-cut-Moreover, they also tweeted about their upcoming new features that include NFTs Staking within their platform that I haven't seen in another platform yet, such a WoW for me personally. -cut-So this feature exists already? I've just seen one other Solana based casino planning for such feature and thought it would be original. I guess they got their idea from here.They also don't have any sports and seem to be focusing on using the meme/SPL tokens. So i definitely check this out to see how far this is ahead.But in this casino you need to connect your wallet it seems. I am uncertain if that's a good or a bad thing. What's the catch on that? In most casinos i have played you don't need to do that.

comments.author: tusandii
comments.body: Quote from: o48o on March 14, 2023, 03:24:46 PMQuote from: tusandii on February 27, 2023, 02:36:57 PM-snip-So this feature exists already? Yes, it's true that this feature already exists and works well in Solcasino, so you don't need to worry about it.If you want to know about the details of the clarity, you can visit and check there yourself to prove the truth of this feature.QuoteBut in this casino you need to connect your wallet it seems. I am uncertain if that's a good or a bad thing. What's the catch on that? In most casinos i have played you don't need to do that.In fact, all web3-based casinos directly use or connect to wallets to be able to play there without us having to register first and as @klidex has said.You don't need to worry about security because they definitely guarantee the safety of every user, moreover they also have many loyal customers who are active every day.But all choices are your own whether to have good or bad thoughts.

comments.author: o48o
comments.body: Quote from: tusandii on March 14, 2023, 03:53:51 PMQuote from: o48o on March 14, 2023, 03:24:46 PMIn fact, all web3-based casinos directly use or connect to wallets to be able to play there without us having to register first and as @klidex has said.You don't need to worry about security because they definitely guarantee the safety of every user, moreover they also have many loyal customers who are active every day.But all choices are your own whether to have good or bad thoughts.I don''t doubt that they say that they guarantee the safety, but i wasn't worried about third party attack but the site rugging itself and exploiting the smart contract.But as you said it has loyal customers i first need to check it out their community's strength myself before i want to risk connecting any wallets to random sites.Not to mention depositing nfts for staking. I don't care even if i have small amounts in the wallet, i've been scammed before and it's starting to annoy me to lose even a small test sum from the wallet .But anyway, thanks for the new casino tip, i will check it out.
